kw.name: Create Dictionary

kw.doc: Converts the given item to a Unicode string.

kw.doc: Deserialize ``s`` (a ``str``, ``bytes`` or ``bytearray`` instance containing a JSON document) to a Python object.

kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.
